message.body: did you get my FB message? it's been acting up for me tonight
yeah I got it
any thoughts on it? =P
eh
I talked to her today at happy hour
we got there a little before everyone else
and we talked after as well
and?
well, apparently theres some baggage she wants to deal with back home beforehand
Is she moved here or just visiting?
so we've agreed to just keep it casual until she gets back from merry ol' England
SHe moved here just short of a year ago
interesting
and she's going to visit in a couple weeks, mid-june
for like two weeks or so
so what are your thoughts?
I just don't want to get in your way, haha
It's not like we're physically flirty or anything, so that's not a problem.
honestly, at this point I don't think you can do anything but help
Not sure how prevalent the knowledge is of the sleeping situation or how that might affect her interest
umm, pretty much everyone knows =|
yeah
I mean, I don't mind or anything. I just don't want it being a problem for you since you seem to like her =/
but they also know about my interest in claire, so I think it's dine
*fine
brb, co-op meeting
does SHE know though?
does who know what?
does Claire know about the sleeping situation
eh, no
she doesnt even know who you are
right. that's more what I was talking about.
Is she going to be at Josh's?
possibly
well, if it comes up, let me know how you want to handle it =P
when is his party again?
June 9th
I think she said she was busy, but I believe there's a good chance she will be there
I don't really see it being a problem. Assuming you don't assault her
Have I displayed a penchant for assaulting people?
um
maybe a little
just hitting really
Women? =P
well no
hey, after the way things have been going, I can't be too careful
eh?
brb
I was referring to the dan/kristin/amy love triangle
ahh
lol
slightly different situation
I am not and have never been infatuated with you =P
understood
but when alcohol is involved
haha, no I think we would be fine
while most people are aware of what goes on between us, they aren't about to blurt anything out
and really, to claire its no different than Val and I hanging out at a party
k
part of me feels just a tad guilty
not telling her, but hey
I never said I wasn't sleeping with anyone
and she didn't ask =|
Why would you/she?
You're not dating
It's none of her business
And it's not like you're emotionally involved
right
but it's generally assumed by most of the population that if you ask someone out that you aren't sleeping with/dating anyone else
It is?
What's that saying about assumptions.
I can't...quite... something... about it being bad...
So many short guys on OkC
Sigh
short?
Yes
er
7'8 is the opposite of what I was getting at
don't assume, it makes an ass out of u and me
I wasn't being serious. I know full well what the saying is =P
Point is, it's their fault for assuming.
If someone expressed interest in me, I wouldn't be surprised if there were other relationships going on in the early stages.
Once things started getting serious, I'd want there to be exclusivity, but it doesn't make sense to expect/require it before then
well, the dating part I don't think is all that surprising
if they are sleeping with someone, it is assumed that it's serious to most people
so wait, 5'8" is an unacceptable height for a guy?
It's not unacceptable
It's just short
I like guys who are taller than me
why you looking anyway?
People messaged me
oh, right
I forgot that women get messages >.<
I also messaged a guy after I got the alert that he'd looked at my profile
#practicingwhatipreach
oh, how very forward of you
what did you say?

Well, I was going to message you to say YOU HAVE AMAZING EYES, but apparently you get that all the time, so never mind.
According to my calendar, I will likely be at [bar local to him] on July [date] ([rare and famous beer] will allegedly be on tap that night). If you see me, you should say hi.
~L~
The _one_ time I don't include any smiley faces, and it seems like either of those paragraphs would have benefited from them.
ah well
huh
interesting
he probably won't respond
a bit too forward
Don't really care, haha
I was kind of kidding
You're right though
But he might actually say hi at the bar.
Assuming he goes
why would he go?
and I finally turned the pinch zoom off on my touchpad
was driving me crazy
Aw, I just got a "you are beautiful"
so adorable
so should go out with him
Too bad that's all he said.
*you
yup
a numbers guy
Thanks for ruining it =P
ahaha
He did spend a fair amount of time on my profile before sending the message
Which makes it even worse that that's all he said haha
Im getting on there now
I got the alert that he was looking at my profile
And then like 7 minutes later I got an alert that I received a message
well that doesn't necessarily mean he was on there for seven minutes
but agreed, should have been able to come up with something better than that
what's his username?
Haven't actually looked
Other than briefly at the pictures
He's like a 66% match and I didn't like his face
So I stopped looking at that point
this is the 'you're beautiful' guy?
yeah
pretty awful
see I actually read the profiles >.>
I wouldn't say he's unattractive, but his profile is shit
how about the guy you messaged?
haha, this chick is like a 17% match
which chick?
what's your new account?
I also got this one earlier "Wow - I think you look amazing. ha. But you also seem like someone who's introspective which I definitely like also. I would love to talk sometime if you're up for it."
Love that "ha"
Is he laughing at me? At himself?
Impossible to say.
whoa, I think I love this guy
he's online too
this chick is like ultraconservative
The last one I linked you to?
yeah
Oh, as to why he'd be at the bar... the beer I cited is one of _the_ beers beer-people chase down
It's not from a local brewery and it's incredibly hard to get ahold of
It sells out like crazy
So, if he's as into beer as he seems to claim, he should be interested in it
hmmm
I didn't read his whole profile, a bit long
but he saw the decemberist in concert
ha
henceforth, awesome
If I end up meeting him, I'll try to hook you too up
would you?
yeah, my profile sucks, but I don't care
Just got "I know I'm no where near you, but I just had to send a message saying that you've got a great profile. Seriously!"
what's your username? I wanna see
Ah, you misspelled it the first time
Oh man
did I?
You did
left off an e
omg
oh right
what is the point of your profile hahaha
exactly
I filled that shit out in like 2 minutes
hahaha, did you know that I have a gun?
oh hold on a sec... kristin decided to bother me again
no kristin, I am capable of turning the light out myself, thanks
was the ok to her or me?
you
so what's this about a gun?
I have one
ummm
no, and that's pretty random
I just thought it was entertaining that that was the first "unacceptable answer" that popped up
The rest are pretty unsurprising
but yeah, .22 rifle under my bed
I have no ammo for it, and I don't think it's been fired in almost a decade
yeah, I don't even remember that question
my bow is under there too
why, exactly?
why what
have a gun
because I was really into shooting sports when I was a teenager
don't get me wrong, I've thought about it
and I grew up rural, where it was like a fact of life
Besides, it barely counts
but why keep it then
Because it's pretty, and I still like shooting
pretty?
Yep
you're a fairly odd person
whatever, you haven't seen my gun
lol
I make no claims to be not-odd
you should date that guy
criiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiinge
Where do I start
1) Profile pic of unimpressive abs. I mean, please. 2) Trash stash. 3) He's younger than me. 4) DAUGHTER. At 25. 5) 5'8 6) Ew
ahahaa
best. profile. ever
I need to go to bed
so did you get my message about getting together?
About your schedule?
yeah
turns out Im not exactly busy tomorrow
as I believe I had originally indicated
You're welcome to either join me or come up later
Alternatively, Monday looks possible, for either you coming up or me going down (ha).
hehe
or both
=P
sorry, couldn't resist
Though, if I'm visiting on the 9th, I'm not sure how amendable I'd be to two trips in a week down to Newark =/
I like the free part, but I prolly shouldn't
Well, that just means that there isn't a charge to get in or whatev
it's pay-as-you-go
right, which I like
I like Baltic Thunder, so that's why I'm going, haha
yeah, I thought I was suppose to go camping that weekend, but I haven't heard much about it
I ended up making an appointment that Saturday morning, and I have my self-defense class on Sunday.
So it's going to be another one of those weekends
it is kinda my turn
daminit
lol
hmm, kinda like how that sounds
I have no idea what you're saying at this point haha
I don't like the idea of driving all over
mainly
Yeah, tell me about it =P
we are suppose to have meditation tomorrow night, since we missed it monday
lol
then next monday we resume our regular meditation
hahaha
but I can miss it
the drive last week, or whenever that was, back from your place wasn't bad
took less than an hour
but my truck still sucks on gas
relatively anyway
Now's for bed
yes
ttyl
nite
hmmm, so looks like camping might be happening
is that this weekend or next weekend?
next, same as Josh's thing
ah
so in that case, I wouldn't be going
too many conflicts are arising
every damn weekend
yeah
would you be interested in camping/?
Doubt I'd be able to =/
Something Friday night, something Saturday morning, and something Sunday that I'd have to leave in the morning for
ah
I forgot that was next weekend, was thinking it was this one
Same thing this weekend haha
there will be other camping trips
you could still go to Josh's
Yeah, I'm hoping to make it out to something this summer =/
I've been wanting to go camping for like 2 years now
might go friday night, then come back for the party on sat
Where are you guys going?
ah
so far I have 2 declines
need food
are you the organizer?
seemed like someone else was the driving force behind the trip
it was originally Dan and Rebecca
but Dan is a slacker
why do people question me?
chances are they are just going to look like fools
haha
ok, so as I was saying...
I was thinking that you were leaving for the event tonight from work, so I could meet you in WC and leave from there, then ride back tomorrow morning (assuming you were going to work)
but from what I understand now, you are going home first?
then going to philly
then back home, and NOT to work the next morning
Tonight: leaving work, going to drink at 2 places, going home, not going to work tomorrow/staying home, going into the city tomorrow night
I apparently changed my approach to that halfway through typing it
ah
I kinda thought that was what you meant, it just didnt make sense the other way
Sorry for overturning the plans you didn't talk to me about. ^_^
well it was just a thought, and I was going to mention it to you when I got around to it
not having a smartphone is harder than I thought
I still think my plan was better...
not really though, because it turns out it's not that much farther for me to drive to WC then your place
It would have been a great plan if I didn't have plans on Friday
it wouldnt have mattered actually, because you would have dropped me off in the morning
hm?
friday morning, on your supposed way to work, where I would be parked nearby
right
You could have parked at my workplace
see
We can reserve that plan for some other time possibly
yes, agreed
quite brilliant, if I may say so
But the whole reason I'm working from home tomorrow is so that I can get into the city by 6:30 via the train and NOT have to then drive 30-40 minutes when I get back to my car
You have nothing to do with those plans
kinda like the 'drive from work to my place, then leave in the morning from my place to work' plan
Yeah, which we can also possibly do sometime
those are plans I wasn't aware of until recently
I'm aware
ohhhh, it's first friday
just realized
It's beer festival Friday, haha
and that
okay, thank god we were talking about this
I never would have thought having too many things to do could be such a problem
because I just remembered to print out my tickets
which I was going to do tomorrow
before I decided to work from home
interesting
hmmm
sometimes I wish I could fly
sometimes you wish you could touch the sky?
or teleport or something
teleportation ftw
no, and I don't believe I can fly either
much more efficient
yeah but not nearly as fun
and I'm talking Superman flying, so I can regulate speed
https://www.google.com/search?rlz=1C1CHFX_enUS483US484&sugexp=chrome,mod=10&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8&q=how+fast+can+superman+fly
lol
hmm, no one seems to know
best answer I've found is 'fast enough'
hahah
Im sure he can be anywhere on earth in a matter of minutes, which works for me
Milena, regarding the camping trip, "Nobody gave an exact date when we were in VA (not that I remember anyway)..."
and the answer is yes, we did give an exact date
Meh
people DID use to plan things before fb
/shrug
and honestly, I'd almost rather she NOT come camping. Last time was enough for a while
She's incapable of relaxing
hm
I could see that being an issue for me
Note to self: bring reading materials
which issue?
Inability to relax
really?
when camping?
you're out in the middle of the woods staring at a campfire
I haven't been camping in yeeeeeeeeeeearrrs
But I know that I get fidgety while watching tv and playing video games
relaxing is pretty much the M.O.
yeah
you know what I hate? not being in control of things
when I leave it up to others, things turn to shit
yep
I'd rather just handle it myself
like at HH yesterday, when we got one check to split amongs 11 peole
*people
and surprisingly, not everyone had cash
I'm going to go ahead an assume you're being sarcastic with that
well done
someone decided to just take the cash, subtract that amount from the total, and then split the rest amongst the cards evenly
uh what
til josh was like,
'well not everyone ordered the same thing"
This is why I try to establish that checks will be split at the beginning
although with 11 people they prob wouldn't have been fond of that
So I was like, just write down the last four # of your card and the amount to charge
thinking that it was pretty much common sense
sure enough, someones like "so who figures out what we each owe"
and I'm like, "YOU figure out how much you owe"
MATH, BITCHES, DO IT
it's not a big deal, again, if I'm in charge at the beginning
so anyway...
about tonight, I feel that there is some simple way to do this. Where are you going after work and what time?
Earth Bread and Brewery in Mt Airy. Leaving work around 5:30-5:45
And then to the Iron Hill in Chestnut Hill
A friend of mine will be there
I might skip EBB, depending on what they say when I call them in 30 minutes
the Iron Hill is right up the road
both are relatively close to your place
yes
You can either come along or meet me at my apartment at like 9-9:30
hmmm
decisions
dislike
lol
My friend Sharon will be there
well I don't want to be a third wheel
I'm not dating her
She's met other friends of mine and gotten along fine
not sure why people use that expression. A third wheel actually adds quite a bit of stability
XD
I probably shouldnt, but it would most likely be more interesting than meditation tonight
depending on your friend sharon of course
She's cool
Other than my ex, I have pretty good taste in people, I think
lately I have found I have little tolerance for certain people
Sharon is chill and mature and married and non-drama-y
She's an IT person
OMFG, so krstin like freaks out at me yesterday when I talked to her about Amy
speaking of drama-y
why
you should tell her that high school is, like, soooo 15 years ago
because she doesn't handle criticism well, which, ironically, she was complaining was Amy's problem. Basically she's jealous of Amy because she thinks Dan likes her, which he doesn't exactly
in her defense, she does have family problems going on right now
which is why I told her to forget about the stupid drama and just avoid hanging out with Dan and Amy
honestly, just another reason why I'm considering coming out this evening =\
yeah
I am a little confused though, I thought you were specifically going to the EBB for the Baltic Thunder or whatev, now you're saying you may skip?
Yeah, their website seems to suggest that they only do 13 and 20 oz pours
So to compare them, I'd have to get 3 pints
Which is not ideal
If they don't do flights / samplers, then it's kind of moot
yeah it's not really clear
they make it sound like it's a tasting, which would indicate samples
place does seem more interesting than IH
IH has other beer that Sharon and I want to try
I do like their beer, and food
Okay, EBB is doing flights for the Baltic Thunder
ah HA!
did you see the pic of that place with the badass mural?
http://www.earthbreadbrewery.com/images/Finished.jpg
yes, I've been to the website, lol
ok, Im in
Do you want to meet at my place and go down together, or just meet there? Timing might be a little obnoxious
but you'll need to buy me a beer :-P
to line up
Oh I will, will I?
I've bought the alcohol the last two times we've hung out =P
damnit
lol
but I feed you....ah man
lol
I knew I would end up saying something like that eventually
I don't mind buying something, but I'm not buying all your stuff tonight =P
I didn't say that
Just saying ^_^
I do have to drive up there
Really? You're really going to try using that?
sure, why not
You were better off with the food
my thing is, if you drive down here then I'm willing to treat you to something
...seriously?
ugh
LOL we don't go anywhere haha
hahaha
it's not a big deal
regardless
we don't have to GO anywhere, food/booze whatever
you're hilarious
AND you were in Baltimore, so technically on the way =D
THIS time
I'm still like 2-3 trips up on you
WHA?
hmmm, maybe
XD
but those where for pigroast/potlucks
different things entirely
and I'm a bitch when it comes to driving
which is odd because I've done so much of it
Hey. If it's not worth the drive for you, no big deal.
No pressure, lol
I know, it's pretty ridiculous
I just think Dan is rubbing off on me
shit!
I don't need to hear about you two rubbing off on each other
So...yeah I don't care, meet at your place or there. Whatever works best. I am willing to drive us there if it helps
Unless you're going to include graphic descriptions and internal/external dialogue. I like my erotica to have a decent amount of characterization.
yeah, yeah
C'mon, that was funny
I'm being serious here, Liz
Boring.
Let's meet at my apartment. I'll drive.
time?
Unless Sharon decides to meet us there too, in which case, she'll probably drive
I'm leaving here in 30-45 minutes
Will take me 30-45 minutes to get home
So you should leave soon
ah shit
haha
there's no way that will work
When can you leave?
It'll take me 15 min just to get home
Where are you?
my cousins
Ah
then another 15 to get ready
so earliest would be 5:30 - 5:45
and it will take me an hour to get to your place
so unless you want to wait for me to get there
Yeah, probably just meet there then.
were you planning on stopping home first?
I was planning on going straight there until you were tossed into the mix. Then it seemed more sensible to go home and drive in one car.
I guess I can text Sharon and see if 7-7:30 would work for her =/
blah
it's not really that big of a deal for me to meet you there, assuming parking isn't horrible
yeah, I have no idea what the parking is like
I've been to mount airy, it's free from what I recall but may have to walk a bit
Looks like there's a lot on W Highland
Which is pretty close
ah man, I just got directions
puts me on 76
I'm out...
haha, j/k
That might be to the Iron Hill
which is right down the road
So 476 + driving down Germantown
yeah that's the way I was thinking of going
which isn't much better, but it's not 76
alright, I need to get moving
I'll let you know when Im on the road and what my eta looks like
k
